title: Did The Lakers Make The Right Offseason Decisions?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim Bontemps and Dave McMenamin to discuss a memorable trip to the White House for Bontemps, the Lakers’ start to the season, the success of players traded from Los Angeles and the Bulls surging with their new pieces blending well together.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Were Offseason Decisions Right In LA? Are The Bulls' Sustainable?
